data.name: FieldMustBeString
data.value: The field '{0}' must be a string.
data.comment: Used in NotEmptyStringAttribute and ApNumberAttribute when field is not a string type

data.name: Order_InvalidVatCode
data.comment: TOrderValidator - when VatCode is not in the allowed set. {0} = VatCode value, {1} = valid codes list

data.name: Order_InvalidBarcode
data.value: Invalid Barcode '{0}'. Must be EAN-8 (8 digits) or EAN-13 (13 digits).
data.comment: TOrderValidator - when Barcode format is invalid. {0} = Barcode value

data.name: Order_PaymentModeMix
data.value: Cannot mix old (Amount/Method) and new (Cash/Card/Szep/Afr) payment modes.
data.comment: TOrderValidator - when both old and new payment modes are used

data.name: Order_InsufficientPayment
data.value: Total paid ({0}) is less than order total ({1}).
data.comment: TOrderValidator - when total paid is less than order total. {0} = total paid, {1} = order total

data.name: Order_VatStatusRequired
data.value: VatStatus is required for invoices (DOMESTIC, OTHER, or PRIVATE_PERSON).
data.comment: TOrderValidator - when VatStatus is missing for invoice

data.name: Order_InvalidVatStatus
data.comment: TOrderValidator - when VatStatus is not valid. {0} = VatStatus value, {1} = valid values list

data.name: Order_TaxNumberRequired
data.value: TaxNumber is required when VatStatus is DOMESTIC.
data.comment: TOrderValidator - when TaxNumber is missing for DOMESTIC VatStatus

data.name: Order_CommunityOrThirdStateTaxIdRequired
data.value: CommunityVatNumber or ThirdStateTaxId is required when VatStatus is OTHER.
data.comment: TOrderValidator - when both CommunityVatNumber and ThirdStateTaxId are missing for OTHER VatStatus
